title: Rebel Wisdom Festival, Next Weekend
description:
The Rebel Wisdom Festival is two days of rebellious ideas and profound experiences on May 30 & 31. Join some of the world's most pioneering minds as we find new ways to make sense together, experiment and build the future. 

Includes talks by channel favourites like Daniel Schmachtenberger, Nora Bateson, Douglas Rushkoff, Jamie Wheal, Ros Watts and many more. Sharpen your sensemaking and sovereignty with over a dozen workshops, including meditation, inquiry, Dialogos, Circling & breathwork and collective intelligence practice. 

Sign up for free on www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/festival 

Rebel Wisdom films of some of the Festival speakers: 

Daniel Schmachtenberger in 'War on Sensemaking': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7LqaotiGWjQ
Nora Bateson in 'Predicting the Pandemic': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=C6JdLWALZKo&t=3135s
Douglas Rushkoff in Tech vs Human: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=koE-ZQia15E
John Vervaeke in 'After the Meaning Crisis': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yz6qgfjGMAg&t=204s
Jamie Wheal in 'How to Spot a Cult': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=t9_FcnECNS8&
Ros Watts in 'Psychedelic Medicine': https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9b1d-TprqEE

The Festival is supported entirely by donations. To support, visit https://donorbox.org/the-rebel-wisdom-online-festival

You can listen to podcast versions of our films on Spotify or Apple Podcasts by searching 'Rebel Wisdom' or download episodes from our Podbean page: https://rebelwisdom.podbean.com
 
You can also become a Rebel Wisdom member, for many benefits including our regular Q&As with the interviewees from our films, check out: https://www.rebelwisdom.co.uk/plans
